title: Entente: Cross-silo Intrusion Detection on Network Log Graphs with Federated Learning
summary: Graph-based Network Intrusion Detection Systems (GNIDS) have gained significant momentum in detecting sophisticated cyber-attacks, such as Advanced Persistent Threats (APTs), within and across organizational boundaries. Though achieving satisfying detection accuracy and demonstrating adaptability to ever-changing attacks and normal patterns, existing GNIDS predominantly assume a centralized data setting.
